name: Gunship Wars Helicopter Strike
description:
Gunship Helicopter Game is most realistic and amazing air strike modern combat battle available on app store. Be an Air Chief Marshal in Your Air force army show your chaos strengthen to your enemy air crafts that cross your air limits and start destruction in your homeland. Be an modern commando in this air futuristic war and shoot warships, tanks, army forces, jets and choppers with your most powerful High Tech Arsenal and missiles. This military aircraft gunship battle will give you experience of real jet fighter and shoot most real iron choppers in this air assault gunship strike game.

Download and play for best Gunship Helicopter War Experience!
